projects.title: project_2_name
projects.description: Git-finder was my first attempt to create a React dynamic web app to consume APIs. Here is where I discovered the utility first approach to style HTML elements. I built git-finder to start my journey with React and its ecosystem. React Router was also used.

projects.title: project_3_name
projects.description: Architectural Firm website. A customized HTML template was used.

projects.title: project_4_name
projects.description: Shortify is a link shortner. I made this web app while experimenting with some of my favourite technologies: React, Nodejs and Containers. The front-end is hosted on Netlify while the back-end is containerized thanks to Docker on a private VPS. I made a user registration process, passwords are safely hashed with bcrypt. Users can shorten and manage their links, that can be activated or deactived when requested
